HomePage.title: Sybor Digital
HomePage.description: We offer enterprise-level software engineering, boutique design, and scalable web/mobile solutions. Building the future together.

hero.description: We build sustainable, scalable, and high-performance projects for your brand with next-generation software technologies and enterprise-level engineering discipline.

services.title: What We Do?
services.subtitle: We empower your digital presence with modern technologies and strategic, scalable solutions.

corporate.title: Corporate Website
corporate.highlight: Professional websites that build trust, load fast and contribute directly to your sales.
corporate.description: Your strongest showcase in the digital world. We develop SEO‑friendly, mobile‑first corporate websites that turn visitors into customers and reflect your brand identity clearly.
process: Brand analysis and target audience definition
benefits: Flawless experience on mobile and desktop

ecommerce.title: E‑Commerce Systems
ecommerce.highlight: Secure payment infrastructure and sales‑oriented design to grow your revenue.
ecommerce.description: Your digital store that sells 24/7. With an easy‑to‑manage admin panel, fast checkout flow and scalable infrastructure, you stand out in e‑commerce.

landing.title: Campaign & Landing Pages
landing.highlight: High‑performance landing pages that turn ad traffic into customers.
landing.description: Conversion‑focused campaign pages. We create clear‑messaged, fast‑loading landing pages that maximize the value of every ad click.

blog.title: News & Blog Portals
blog.highlight: Fast, SEO‑ready and user‑friendly content management systems.
blog.description: High‑traffic content platforms. We build news and blog sites that focus on organic growth, include ad integrations and are easy to manage.

app.title: Mobile Application
app.highlight: High‑performance mobile applications running on both iOS and Android.
app.description: Bring your brand into your customer’s pocket. With Flutter‑based apps published on the App Store and Google Play, you increase user engagement and retention.

saas.title: SaaS & Cloud Software
saas.description: Subscription‑based digital products. With cloud infrastructure, automatic billing and multi‑tenant architecture, we help you launch your own SaaS product.

mvp.title: Startup / MVP Package
mvp.description: Turn your idea into a product quickly. We build a working MVP with minimum cost and time so you can collect real user feedback.

api.title: API & Integrations
api.highlight: Accounting, shipping, payment and marketplace integrations that reduce operational workload.
api.description: Let your systems talk to each other. We automate data flow between different platforms and services, minimizing time loss and human error.

crm.title: CRM (Customer Relationships)
crm.highlight: Increase your sales performance by collecting all customer data in a single panel.
crm.description: Digitalize your sales processes. Track the entire pipeline from lead to closed deal and never miss an opportunity again.

erp.title: ERP (Enterprise Resource Planning)
erp.highlight: Integrate accounting, inventory, HR and operations into one system.
erp.description: Manage all operations from a single center. We build corporate software that automates, reports and controls your business processes.

hr.title: HR & Personnel Management
hr.highlight: Manage all personnel processes from one panel and digitalize HR operations.
hr.description: From hiring to performance reviews, from payroll to leave tracking, we centralize all HR processes in a single system that strengthens internal communication and provides transparent, reportable data.

booking.title: Booking & Reservation Systems
booking.highlight: Manage your services easily with an online booking and reservation infrastructure.
booking.description: For doctors, consultants, beauty salons, gyms or training centers, we build end‑to‑end booking and reservation solutions. Clients choose suitable time slots themselves while you manage operations from an admin panel.
process: Designing booking flows for your business model
Planning calendars and resources (rooms, staff, etc.)
Setting up notifications, payments and integrations
benefits: Clear visibility of free and busy slots

uiux.title: UI/UX Design
uiux.highlight: We analyze user behavior and design conversion‑oriented interfaces.
uiux.description: Design that is not only beautiful but also strategic. Interfaces crafted by considering every click and scroll turn into more sales and stronger engagement.

ai.title: AI & Automation
ai.highlight: Accelerate your processes with AI‑powered automations and minimize human error.
ai.description: We enhance customer support, reporting, recommendation engines and workflows with artificial intelligence. Chatbots, smart forms, data analysis and decision‑support systems free your team to focus on strategic work.
benefits: Significant time savings on repetitive tasks

seo.title: SEO & Performance Optimization
seo.highlight: Drive organic growth with technical SEO and content strategy.
seo.description: Become more visible on Google. We implement technical SEO fixes, content strategy and page‑speed optimizations that move you ahead of competitors.

ads.title: Digital Advertising & Growth
ads.highlight: We plan performance‑driven ad campaigns on Meta, Google and other channels.
ads.description: Reach the right audience with the right message and budget. We craft and continuously optimize ad strategies aligned with your sales, lead or brand‑awareness goals.
benefits: More efficient use of ad budget

maintenance.title: Maintenance & Support Plans
maintenance.highlight: Keep your systems running continuously with regular updates, backups and technical support.
maintenance.description: Your projects stay safe at all times. With monthly maintenance plans, we keep your software up‑to‑date, fast and secure, and respond quickly in emergencies.

security.title: Cybersecurity & Backup
security.highlight: We provide security scanning, firewall configuration and automated backup solutions.
security.description: Keep your data safe. We build multilayered protection against cyber‑attacks, data loss and system vulnerabilities.

ticket.title: Ticket & Helpdesk Systems
ticket.highlight: Track customer requests from a single hub and organize communication between teams.
ticket.description: We move your customer and internal support processes into a professional, ticket‑based helpdesk system. With prioritization, status tracking and SLA management, no request is lost.
benefits: Clear view of workload across the team

lms.title: Training & LMS Platforms
lms.highlight: Move your training, exam and certification processes into a scalable online platform.
lms.description: For internal training, consultancy programs or online courses, we build modern Learning Management Systems. Participant tracking, course plans and exam modules all live in a single dashboard.
process: Analysis of training needs and content structure
Designing course, module and exam flows
Integrating live sessions and video infrastructure

qr.title: QR Menus & Digital Forms
qr.highlight: Bring printed materials into digital with smart QR‑based solutions.
qr.description: From restaurant menus to event registration forms, from field reporting to product catalogs, we design micro web apps accessible via QR codes.
process: Analysis of use cases and physical locations

steps.subtitle: We bring your projects to life with a transparent and effective process from start to finish

step1.title: Discovery & Planning
step1.description: We analyze your needs and create a clear roadmap.

step2.title: Design & Development
step2.description: We develop the project with modern design and clean code.

step3.title: Test & Optimization
step3.description: We conduct performance, security, and user tests.

step4.title: Launch & Support
step4.description: We launch the project and provide continuous support.

projects.subtitle: Take a look at our successful projects

AboutPage.title: About Us | Sybor Digital
AboutPage.description: We create boutique and scalable digital solutions with a computer engineering discipline.

hero.description: We combine the quality of large agencies with the flexibility and sincerity of a small team.

story.title: Our Story
story.quote: We set out to be a transparent technology partner as an alternative to the complex processes of large agencies.
story.p1: With computer engineering discipline, we produce strategic and scalable solutions for complex digital problems of businesses.
story.p2: We embrace every project as our own startup and position ourselves as your technology partner, not just a supplier.
story.statsDesc: Instead of bulky legacy systems, we build your project with the most up-to-date, fast, and scalable modern architectures.

stats.title: Principles Reflected in Quality
stats.subtitle: Instead of cliché agency metrics, we focus on transparent standards that bring real value to your project.

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: These principles determine our working culture and approach to projects.

focus.title: Focus
focus.description: We prioritize quality and customer satisfaction in every project.

passion.title: Passion
passion.description: We love what we do and make this passion felt in every project.

collab.title: Collaboration
collab.description: We produce the best results together by working one-on-one with our clients.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: From code quality to design, we aim for excellence in every detail.

process.title: How Does Our Process Work?
process.subtitle: We manage every step from idea to launch with a planned, measurable, and transparent approach.

step1.title: First Meeting
step1.description: We listen to your project and goals. Free consultancy.

step3.title: Design & Development
step3.description: We move forward iteratively with you throughout the process.

whyUs.title: Why Should We Be Your Tech Partner?
whyUs.subtitle: We don't just develop software; we build the digital infrastructure that will grow your business together.

reason1.title: Direct Communication
reason1.desc: You work directly with engineers. Decisions are made quickly without intermediate layers.

reason2.title: Agile Delivery
reason2.desc: We proceed sprint-based, producing working solutions for your business goals ASAP.

reason3.title: Cost-Oriented Approach
reason3.desc: Thanks to our boutique model, you invest in actual production instead of unnecessary agency costs.

reason4.title: Custom Architecture
reason4.desc: We design scalable, secure, and tailor-made systems instead of ready-made templates.

reason5.title: Continuous Support
reason5.desc: We are with you after launch; we conduct maintenance, monitoring, and development processes together.

reason6.title: Scalability Focused
reason6.desc: We build infrastructures ready for tomorrow's growth while meeting today's needs.

ContactPage.title: Contact | Sybor Digital
ContactPage.description: Contact us to bring your project to life. Your digital solution partner with modern technologies.

hero.description: Have an idea? Do you need professional support to grow your project in the digital world? We are ready to listen to you.

form.title: Let's Bring Your Project to Life
form.subtitle: Don't get bogged down in technical details. Tell us your idea, and we'll bring it to life with the most suitable technology.

q1.q: How does the project process work, where do we start?
q1.a: Everything starts with a discovery meeting. We listen to your needs and goals. Then we offer a custom roadmap, design drafts, and technology recommendations. With your approval, we move to the design and coding phase.

q2.q: How long does it take to complete a website or mobile app?
q2.a: It depends on the scope. A corporate website takes 2-4 weeks, while a comprehensive e-commerce or mobile app project can vary between 6-12 weeks.

q3.a: We prefer up-to-date and high-performance technologies. Next.js and Tailwind CSS for web; Flutter for mobile; .NET or Node.js for backend solutions.

q4.q: Do you provide technical support after the project is finished?
q4.a: Absolutely. We provide 30 days of free technical support after delivery. Monthly maintenance and support packages are available for later.

q5.a: Our standard procedure is 50% at the start and 50% upon delivery. For large projects, we can create flexible plans based on specific milestones.

q6.q: Will my website be SEO compatible?
q6.a: Yes, we set up basic SEO infrastructure (speed, meta tags, mobile compatibility) in all websites we develop.

q7.q: Do we have revision rights on the design?
q7.a: Yes, you have 2 rounds of free revisions on the demos presented during the design phase.

q8.q: Do you handle Domain and Hosting processes?
q8.a: If you don't have a domain or server, we handle the purchase and installation from the most suitable provider for you.
